text: Volosyanka () — village (selo) in Skole Raion, Lviv Oblast, of Western Ukraine. It is located in the Ukrainian Carpathians, within the limits of the Eastern Beskids. The population of village is 1452 persons. Local government - Volosiankivska village council.Волосянківська сільська рада Volosiankivska village council includes village Khashchovania and Yalynkuvate. The first written mention of Volosyanka which dates from the year 1572. Село Волосянка (Львівська обл.): карта вулиць, фото == Geography == Village are located in the valley of the rivers Slavka River and Yalynkuvata River. West of the village are the vertices Vysokyy VerhГора Високий Верх (), Plischka (), Mount Yarochysche () and Mount Yalyna (). In the south is Mount Ilsa (). The village Volosyanka is situated in the from the regional center Lviv, from the district center Skole, and from Slavske.DELLA == Attractions == In this village there are an architectural monument of national importance. That is the wooden Church of the Holy Eucharist and a belfry.Пам'ятки архітектури Сколівського району File:Church of the Holy Eucharist (Volosyanka).JPG|Church of the Holy Eucharist 1804 (wood) File:The church of transfer St. Nicholas relics (Volosyanka).JPG|A newly built the temple of transfer St. Nicholas relics == References == == External links == * natural attractions * weather.in.ua * Волосянка.
